announcementdesc: Here you can create an announcement that will begin displaying on your website at a specified time.
title: Title
announcementStartInfo: Your announcement is scheduled to begin displaying on
endDateAfterStartWarn: Warning: The end date you selected is after the selected start date. Your announcement will not display.
announcementNoEndDate: Your announcement is scheduled to continue displaying until you select a new end date.
announcementEndInfo: Your announcement is scheduled to stop displaying on
socialTip: Keep all of your customers updated by posting to your other social media accounts.
stylesdesc: Choose a style option to change the text and colors of your announcement.
layoutsdesc: Choose a layout to change the look of your announcement.
makepermanenttext: Keep displaying this announcement until unchecked
